name: Unyeilding Diamond
description:
Rhonda finds herself trapped in the ruins of her latest archaeological investigation. In order to escape Rhonda must collect treasures, granting her new abilities allowing her to traverse through the ancient and mysterious ruins.

Unyielding Diamond is a 2D platformer with elements commonly associated with meteoroidvania type games. As you clear levels you will find more abilities to allow you progress through following areas.
